media:group.media:description:

Please see http://www.cmkosemen.com/books.html for a complete list of my books.
Answers to a list of questions from Belen Martinez - mostly about "making it" as a spec-evo-centred author and overall creative. The short answer: Is the creative endeavour really compatible with "making it" at all? I also describe my writing process in detail...

***

Questions
1. What do you consider are the requirements to become an author?
2. What are the advantages and disadvantages of being an author?
3. If you have competition, how do you deal with said competition?
4. What to do when inspiration is low?
5. Why do you think being an author/book writer is not being taken seriously?
Especially those who write fantasy.
6. Why is the job of book writing important?
7. What is your writing process?
8. How does one go about publishing a book?
9. Your book Snaiad has many fascinating creatures, what are some things that helped you come up with them?
